rows.label: qev086404_MSG0001
rows.name: Koko never dream for minute that Tatsu still alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0002
rows.name:
Tatsu also give up hope
when he was dragged off by nasty Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0003
rows.name: But then new friends saved Tatsu![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oh, where are Koko's manners?
Koko is very pleased to meet Tatsu's heropon friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0005
rows.name:
The pleasure is ours, Koko.
I'm Elma, a friend of your son's.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0006
rows.name: And I'm Lin. Nice to meetcha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_JNK0010
rows.name: Flatter

rows.label: qev086404_SEL0011
rows.name: Mention that Koko looks lovely.

rows.label: qev086404_JNK0020
rows.name: Tease

rows.label: qev086404_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that Koko looks good enough to eat.

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0007_m
rows.name: Oh, friend of Tatsu is so charming. And obviously smart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0007_f
rows.name: Oh, friend of Tatsu is so charming. And obviously smart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0008
rows.name: Meh! Koko know that look![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0009
rows.name: Is same look as bad men who raided caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0010
rows.name:
Koko not need Dadapon to fend off
evil ones who want to eat littlepon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0011
rows.name: Get ready for beatdown![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0012
rows.name: Yikes! P-please calm down, ma'am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0013
rows.name: Grrr...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0014
rows.name: Tatsu is just glad to see Mamapon safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0015
rows.name: Caravan scattered to four winds after attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0016
rows.name: That must have been terrible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0017
rows.name: Tatsu thought home was gone forever...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0018
rows.name: I'm glad you made it back, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0019
rows.name: Thank you, Linly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0020
rows.name: Oh! Tatsu is now 13 years old, Mamapon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0021
rows.name: That mean he is full-grown Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0022
rows.name:
And now Tatsu is ready to accept glasses
Mamapon say she hold until he turn 13.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0023
rows.name: Er, right. Those.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0024
rows.name: Are they special in some way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0025
rows.name: Very! Dadapon wear glasses when HE was young Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0026
rows.name:
Tatsu inherited glasses,
but promised not to wear them until all grown up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0027
rows.name: Where's your father now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0028
rows.name: Tatsu not want to talk about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh. Sorry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0030
rows.name: Koko sorry too, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0031
rows.name: Koko was sure Tatsu was gobbled up...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0032
rows.name: So Koko hurled glasses into sea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0033
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-MEEEEEEH![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0034
rows.name: Is old Nopon tradition.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0035
rows.name: Loved one entrusts item to sea so it can float to absent Nopon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0036
rows.name: But...those glasses special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0037
rows.name: Glasses are only thing Tatsu have to remember Dadapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_JNK0030
rows.name: Aid

rows.label: qev086404_SEL0031
rows.name: Offer to help find the glasses.

rows.label: qev086404_JNK0040
rows.name: Brush Off

rows.label: qev086404_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Tatsu to get over it already.

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0038
rows.name:
That's right! If she threw 'em in the ocean,
they probably washed up somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0039
rows.name: Heeey, Linly right. All hope not lost just yet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0040
rows.name: What? That's a terrible thing to say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0041
rows.name: You can't just tell someone to forget about their father![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0042
rows.name: Ms. Koko?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0043
rows.name:
Would you show me where you threw the glasses?
I'll see if I can track the current.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0044
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0045
rows.name: Then they should be right about...here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0046
rows.name: That's not far from NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086404_MSG0047
rows.name: Tatsu go there right away![ST:wait ]
